text: Smuggler's Run 2: Hostile Territory, simply known as Smuggler's Run 2, is a racing video game. It is a sequel to original Smuggler's Run, released on PlayStation 2 and GameCube version release as Smuggler's Run: Warzones. Category:2001 video games Category:Rockstar Games games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Racing video games Category:Video game sequels
title: Smuggler's Run 2
